American League TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Fired Orlando Gomez, bullpen coach, and Leon Roberts, hitting coach.
National League CINCINNATI REDS--Fired Jack McKeon, manager. PITTSBURGH PIRATES--Fired Gene Lamont, manager.
National Basketball Association CHARLOTTE HORNETS--Waived F Rodney Buford. Signed F Terrance Roberson and F Caswell Cyrus. UTAH JAZZ--Signed F Ben Davis and G Ira Bowman.

National Football League CINCINNATI BENGALS--Placed RB Michael Basnight on injured reserve. Signed S JoJuan Armour from the practice squad to a two-year contract. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Acquired TE Alonzo Mayes from Chicago for an undisclosed draft pick. Waived LB Tommy Hendricks.
UNITED STATES GOLF ASSOCIATION--Announced the resignation of Frank Thomas, technical director.

National Hockey League ANAHEIM MIGHTY DUCKS--Assigned G Jean-Sebastien Giguere, C Andy McDonald, LW Kevin Sawyer and RW Petr Tenkrat to Cincinnati of the AHL. LOS ANGELES KINGS--Reassigned G Marcel Cousineau to Lowell of the AHL. International Hockey League KANSAS CITY BLADES--Assigned D Anthony Cappelletti, D Trevor Sherban, F Mike Bayrack, F Colin Chaulk, F Ryan Johnston and G David Arsenault to Missouri of the UHL. Assigned G Ken Carroll, F Forbes MacPherson and F Dan Wildfong to Shreveport of the WPHL.
NATIONAL SOCCER COACHES ASSOCIATION OF AMERICA--Named Craig Bohnert assistant executive director for communications.

ALBANY, N.Y.--Named Todd Beeten assistant athletic facilities director and men's volunteer assistant basketball coach and Kevin Nesbeth women's assistant basketball coach. HOFSTRA--Named Elizabeth Diesa men's and women's assistant golf coach. NEW JERSEY TECH--Named Roger Olean trainer and Mark Mentone coordinator of sports information services. VERMONT--Named Joe Gervais life skills coordinator and Pat Norton men's assistant ice hockey coach.
